dict.acceptation: 碗；一碗东西；碗状物；[体]木球；
参加保龄球赛；[体]投球；[体]玩滚木球；稳而快地行驶；
投掷或滚动（球）；滚球得分；表演保龄球；打倒，撞击；

sent.orig: She formed the clay into a bowl [formed a bowl from the clay]
A steamed bun, area potato strip, bowl of stuffed dumplings, bowl of harsh powder.
sent.trans: 一个馒头，一带薯条，一碗饺子，一碗酸辣粉。

sent.orig: Divides the power bowl and the free bowl two kinds roughly.
sent.trans: 大体分动力辊筒和自由辊筒两种。

sent.orig: This is my bowl;that bowl is yours.
sent.trans: 这是我的碗；那只是你的。

sent.orig: Everyone has a small bowl to share, and everyone will have a small bowl of rice.
sent.trans: 大家有分享一个小的碗，并且大家将食用小碗米饭。
